Translations.Text: Ili pet vi Zul-Qarnain. dir mi narrate vi kelk da his histori
Ni granted him auxtoritat ter proviz him all kinds da means
When li reached far okcident li trov sun setting vast ocean trov popol tie! Ni dir O Zul-Qarnain vi regul as vi wish either pun est kind al them
Li dir As por those transgress ni pun them; tiam when ili return their Lord Li commit them mult retribution
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ricev bon rekompenc; ni trakt them kindly
When li reached far orient li trov sun roz popol hav nothing sxirm them el gxi
Naturally ni est fully aware da cxio li trov
When li reached val 2 palisades li trov popol whose idiom est barely understandable
Ili dir O Zul-Qarnain Gog Magog est corruptors ter. Ni pag vi Can kre barrier us them
Li dir My Lord don me great bounties. Vi cooperate me mi cxarpent dam vi them
Bring me mes de glad. Once li filled gap 2 palisades li dir Blov. Once est rugx hot li dir Help me versx gudr gxi
Tiel ili ne grimp gxi nor could ili bor tru gxi
Li dir This est mercy my Lord When prophecy my Lord ven pas Li kauxz dam cxif! prophecy my Lord est truth
Je ke temp, ni let them invad 1 another tiam korn blov ni summon them all together
Ni prezent Infer ke tag disbelievers
Ili est unu okul tro vual seg My message Nor could ili auxd
